Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler

Interface TransactionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPOP3Handler
    public interface TransactionHandler
    Handler for POP3 TRANSACTION state commands.

    This handler receives commands during the TRANSACTION state (RFC 1939 Section 5), which is active after successful authentication. The client can retrieve, delete, and manage messages in the mailbox.

    All methods receive the user's Mailbox established at login, allowing the handler to access message data for each operation.

    Available operations:

    • mailboxStatus(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.MailboxStatusState) - get mailbox statistics (STAT)
    • list(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.ListState) - list message sizes (LIST)
    • retrieveMessage(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.RetrieveState) - retrieve a message (RETR)
    • markDeleted(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.MarkDeletedState) - mark a message for deletion (DELE)
    • reset(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.ResetState) - undelete all messages (RSET)
    • top(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, int, int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.TopState) - retrieve message headers and N lines of body (TOP)
    • uidl(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.UidlState) - list unique identifiers (UIDL)
    • quit(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.UpdateState) - commit deletions and close (QUIT)
    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    AuthenticateState.accept(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.TransactionHandler)

    • Method Detail

      • mailboxStatus

        void mailboxStatus​(Mailbox mailbox,
                   MailboxStatusState state)
        Called when the client requests mailbox status (STAT command).

        Returns the number of messages and total size of the mailbox.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        state - operations for responding with statistics

      • list

        void list​(Mailbox mailbox,
          int messageNumber,
          ListState state)
        Called when the client requests message listing (LIST command).

        Returns message numbers and their sizes. If a message number is provided, returns information for that message only; otherwise returns information for all messages.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        messageNumber - the specific message number, or 0 for all messages
        state - operations for responding with the list

      • retrieveMessage

        void retrieveMessage​(Mailbox mailbox,
                     int messageNumber,
                     RetrieveState state)
        Called when the client requests message content (RETR command).

        Retrieves the full content of the specified message.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        messageNumber - the message number to retrieve
        state - operations for sending the message content

      • markDeleted

        void markDeleted​(Mailbox mailbox,
                 int messageNumber,
                 MarkDeletedState state)
        Called when the client marks a message for deletion (DELE command).

        Marks the specified message for deletion. The message is not actually deleted until the session ends normally with QUIT.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        messageNumber - the message number to delete
        state - operations for confirming the deletion

      • reset

        void reset​(Mailbox mailbox,
           ResetState state)
        Called when the client resets deletion marks (RSET command).

        Undeletes all messages marked for deletion in this session.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        state - operations for confirming the reset

      • top

        void top​(Mailbox mailbox,
         int messageNumber,
         int lines,
         TopState state)
        Called when the client requests message headers (TOP command).

        TOP retrieves the message headers and the first N lines of the message body (RFC 1939 Section 7).

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        messageNumber - the message number
        lines - the number of body lines to retrieve
        state - operations for sending the content

      • uidl

        void uidl​(Mailbox mailbox,
          int messageNumber,
          UidlState state)
        Called when the client requests unique identifiers (UIDL command).

        Returns unique identifiers for messages. If a message number is provided, returns the UID for that message only; otherwise returns UIDs for all messages.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox
        messageNumber - the specific message number, or 0 for all messages
        state - operations for responding with UIDs

      • quit

        void quit​(Mailbox mailbox,
          UpdateState state)
        Called when the client ends the session (QUIT command).

        QUIT in TRANSACTION state transitions to UPDATE state, committing all deletions before closing the connection.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the user's mailbox (to commit deletions)
        state - operations for closing with update
